description:
16日亚投行在北京隆重举行了开业仪式，准备正式开门营业了！习大大在开业仪式上发表演讲，今天借着习大大致辞的节选语句，学习其中一些常见小词的用法。

既然习大大演讲稿是中文的，那么我们就从译文逆向学习实用表达吧，开启学霸模式！！！
 
一、亚投行的开业，习大大感慨道：
Now is a moment that will be recorded in history.
(童鞋们动手尝试翻译一下。)
 
借机！学习一下record：
go on record
To embrace a certain position publicly:
go on record in favor of the mayor's reelection.
off the record
Not for publication:
The senator told the reporters that his remarks were strictly off the record.
on record
Known to have been stated or to have taken a certain position:
The senator's opposition to the new legislation is on record.
 
二、关于亚投行的作用，习大大说：
The AIIB has a due role to play to raise the level of infrastructure financing and of economic and social development in the region.
 
关于due，我们还可以这么用：
1. give someone his or her due公平对待某人
2.in due course在适当的时机
3.pay one's dues 经过艰苦斗争取得权利
She paid her dues in small-town theaters before being cast in a Broadway play.
 
三、习大大道出亚投行的优势
The demand for infrastructure development in Asia is enormous. Institutions for infrastructure investment, old or new, have much to offer each other, and may well work together through joint financing, knowledge sharing and capacity building. They may engage each other in benign competition, learn from and reinforce each other, and move forward in tandem.
 
学习笔记：
have much to offer each other互补空间巨大
benign competition良性竞争
learn from and reinforce each other相互促进，取长补短
move forward in tandem共同提高
 
四、习大大提到的四六句：
1.Whenever there is a will, there will be a way.
2.As the saying goes, the bonfire burns higher when everyone adds firewood to it.
